compatibility.notes: The ngrep license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Clearly state the origin of the software in documentation.
Acknowledge the original author in advertising materials for derivative works.
Mark altered versions clearly to avoid misrepresentation.
license.name: ngrep
obligations: Do not misrepresent the origin of the software.
Altered versions must be marked as such and not misrepresented.
Advertising materials for derivative works must acknowledge the original author.
Do not use the author's name for endorsement without permission.
Do not remove or alter the copyright notice.
